com.cube.storm

Class ContentSettings.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.ContentSettings.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ContentSettings

    public static class ContentSettings.Builder
extends Object
    The builder class for ContentSettings. Use this to create a new ContentSettings instance with the customised properties specific for your project.

    The following methods are required to be set before you can download any content

    • appId(String) or appId(String, int, int)
    • contentBaseUrl(String)
    • contentVersion(java.lang.String)

    Call build() to build the settings object.

      • build

        public ContentSettings build()
        Builds the final settings object and sets its instance. Use ContentSettings.getInstance() to retrieve the settings instance.
        Returns:
        The newly set ContentSettings instance
